subtasks: Retrieve spill kit containing sand or sawdust
Apply sand or sawdust to contain and absorb the liquid
Monitor spill progression and act promptly
Gather contaminated material into a plastic bag
Seal and label the plastic bag for safe disposal
Access additional information on pesticides and personal protective equipment (PPE) via www.cdc.gov.au
